content.text: What is the stiffness matrix for this part of the groove structure?

The highlighted section represents a corner or transitional part in the groove. Uniform stiffness is applied in all directions to accommodate transitions smoothly.

### Stiffness Matrix
```json
{
  "stiffness_matrix": [
    [100, 0, 0],
    [0, 100, 0],
    [0, 0, 100]
  ]
}
```
